get.description:
Returns the entity: AccountSet. For more information using the query parameters please see: URI Conventions (OData Version 2.0)

The entity: AccountSet supports the following navigational properties: [Transactions, Conditions]
For example: .../AccountSet(Entity-Id)/Transactions/.....

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The syntax of a $expand query option is a comma-separated list of Navigation Properties. Additionally each Navigation Property can be followed by a forward slash and another Navigation Property to enable identifying a multi-level relationship.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The value of a $select System Query Option is a comma-separated list of selection clauses. Each selection clause may be a Property name, Navigation Property name, or the "*" character.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values. See 4.5. Filter System Query Option ($filter) for more information.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values. See 4.2. Orderby System Query Option ($orderby) for more information.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n items

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skip the first n items

parameters.name: $inlinecount
parameters.description: Include count of items

parameters.name: $format
parameters.description: Response format if supported by the backend service.

CustomerExternalID.title: Customer ID (external ID such as User ID, Passport etc.)

CurrentBalanceTotal.title: Current Balance (Total, across all bank accounts)

AvailableAmountTotal.title: Available Amount (Total, across all bank accounts)

AvailableDescription.title: Additional Description & Information for Available Amount

CurrentlyValid.title: Indicator that Condition is currently valid

CustomerExternalID.title: Customer ID (external ID such as User ID, Passport etc.)

AccountHolderID.title: Customer ID (internal ID) which is the Account Holder

CurrentPostingDate.title: Current Posting Date of the Bank

DefaultMinPostingDate.title: Default Minimum Posting Date (Transaction Item retrieval)

DefaultMaxPostingDate.title: Default Maximum Posting Date (Transaction Item retrieval)
